items.title: Graphic Design Workshop For Beginners. Free Design Elements.
items.headline: Learn By Doing Projects In Photoshop & Illustrator. Packaging & Logo Design. Font Psychology & Composition Theory.
objectives_summary: Created stunning photorealistic product packaging for a cereal box and a healthy snack-bar label. Apply this knowledge to creating your own packaging designs.
Communicate better among teams or even at an interview as you are introduced to insightful theories in design based on font psychology, history and consumer behaviour.
Develop your creativity with my practical workshop method of teaching. You learn a vast array of tools & techniques in Photoshop & Illustrator, working side-by-side with me.

items.title: Getting Started with Adobe Illustrator for beginner
items.headline: Crash course to enhance your creative journey!
objectives_summary: Getting started with Adobe Illustrator
Fundamentals of the basic tools used in Adobe Illustrator
Step by step on Creating their Own First Two Designs

items.title: World of Graphic Design
items.headline: All about basics of Graphical designing
objectives_summary: Students will understand the basics of graphical designing like use of colors, typographs etc.
Students will learn applications of Graphical designing

items.headline: Master in Photoshop tools with this course and no prior knowledge will be required.
objectives_summary: Hands-on adobe photoshop tools
Alter images, manipulate images, retouch faces, change clothes, eye color
Create graphics, frame and video timeline, web UI

items.title: Creative Sport Retouch - Create Dynamic Images in Photoshop!
items.headline: Learn how to Create Stunning Dynamic Images with no Experience and Basic Knowledge in Photoshop!
objectives_summary: Retouch and Master Sport Images in Photoshop!
Do simple Raw Conversion in Camera Raw and prepare images to work with Photoshop!
Do a Skin Retouch and Clean up other Parts of the Image!

items.headline: Photoshop: Learn the software and use a Wacom tablet to easily start creating beautiful digital paintings in Photoshop.
objectives_summary: Paint in Photoshop using built in and custom brushes
Navigate the Photoshop UI for painting
Understand layers, blending modes, tool palettes, masking and various other important Photoshop techniques

items.title: Designing  Flat Icons Using Powerpoint
items.headline: Learn to design flat icons without any skills easily
objectives_summary: Design flat icons on any theme using powerpoint within minutes
Working with shapes in powerpoint
Design icons without photoshop and illustrator

items.title: Understanding Images
items.headline: From CMYK to Megapixels.
objectives_summary: Understand the difference between RGB and CMYK color
Understand how Retina graphics are made
Understand the difference between DPI and PPI

items.title: Photoshop Tips and Tricks
items.headline: Speed up your performance & take your Photoshop skill to the next level by learning the hidden features inside Photoshop
objectives_summary: You will get very useful Tips and Tricks about Adobe Photoshop that will help you to take your skill to the next level.

items.title: Design Tickets and Vouchers in Photoshop and Illustrator
items.headline: Learn how to design printable promotional materials in Photoshop and Illustrator
objectives_summary: Learn how to design promotional tickets and voucher cards
Learn how to design printable materials

items.title: Step by step cartoon drawings for kids
items.headline: Learn step by step how to draw people, animals and objects.
objectives_summary: Will be able to understand cartoons and make artistic drawings.
They will learn to draw on a computer
The teaching process used is a kid-tested, step-by-step method that will both inspire and delight your child into drawing action!

items.headline: A quick overview of Moho, Animate, After Effects and Character Animator
objectives_summary: The strengths and weaknesses of animation apps: Moho, Animate, After Effects and Character Animator
